name: subsystem
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a system that forms part of a larger system: These individual languages can be considered as subsystems of one linguistic system. The human body is a system which is comprised of a number of sub-systems.
More examplesFewer examplesThe mechanism is composed of four main subsystems.This subsystem contains a collection of tools that perform various functions. Rainforests are composed of many different subsystems .Some of the electricity that the power plant creates is used to operate the subsystems of the power plant itself.
